components.description: Install available updates or change the set of components.
components.update-confirm: The device will reboot after installing the updates

status.no-updates-available: The latest updates are already installed

components.error: Unable to connect to the update server

errors.402: Service code error. Please contact technical support.
errors.500: The server is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance work.
errors.502: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.504: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.507: Insufficient memory to install all selected components.

popup.title: Keenetic OS components update channel
popup.description: You can install the preview release of Keenetic OS by selecting 'Beta version'.
popup.list-hint:
Here you can change the functions of the device according to your needs by installing the required system components. If updates are available for the components already installed, the system will be fully updated within the limitations of your Keeneticâ€™s hardware.
For a successful components upgrade an Internet connection is required.

components-form.no-connect-description: Failed to get component list from the server. Please try again later
components-form.description: Select desired components by ticking and unticking in the list below, or choose the predefined setup.
components-form.version-change-on-commit-warning: Attention! Changing the components setup will update the Keenetic OS to the latest version.

alert.title: Operating system upgrade
alert.sub-title: Do not turn off the Keenetic until the update is completed.
